document_data.name: ''Windswept Armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Windswept armor''''' was an ancient [[dwarf|dwarven]] set of enchanted heavy armor.
document_data.Powers:
''Windswept armor'' was a set of perforated [[plate mail]] armor with a magical ''+2'' enchantment that improved to ''+4'' when confronting [[gargoyle]]s, commonly found in the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]].

Like other sets of heavy armor, ''windswept armor'', when worn by an arcane spellcaster, resulted in a 40% chance of spell casting failure.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], an ancient set of dwarven ''windswept armor'' could be found on the [[Halls of Light]] level of [[Dwarven Dungeons]] of Myth Drannor, in possession of a group of [[Lizardfolk]].
